stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain':0.9,'no rain':0.1} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {'rain':0.5,'no rain':0.5}

lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {-2:0.99,-10:0.01} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' and weather_outcome == 'rain' else {-2:1.0} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' and weather_outcome == 'no rain' else {-10:0.99,0:0.01} if carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' and weather_outcome == 'rain' else {0:1.0}
